trans-unit.source: Controls access to printers.
trans-unit.target: 控制印表機的存取。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission"></xref> class with the level of printing access specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission"></xref>列印指定的存取層級的類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission"></xref> class with either fully restricted or unrestricted access, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission"></xref>使用完全限制或無限制存取，為指定的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates either the fully restricted (`None`) or the `Unrestricted` form of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限形式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: state is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: state不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限物件的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.
trans-unit.target: 權限物件的複本以原始的權限物件的資源表示相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的權限物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限物件和目標物件的權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限的交集會描述一組都保留在一般作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它代表要傳遞這兩個權限的要求所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的權限物件相同類型的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.
trans-unit.target: 新的權限物件，表示目前物件和指定的目標的交集。

trans-unit.source: This object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交集是空的。

trans-unit.source: target is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: target是不是與目前權限物件相同類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前權限物件是否為指定的權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: This object must be of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件必須是目前的權限物件類型相同。

trans-unit.source: if the current permission object is a subset of target; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果目前權限物件的子集 target ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: target is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: target是不是與目前權限物件相同類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否不受限制的權限。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission object represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限物件代表的存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權限不受限制;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code's level of printing access.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定程式碼的存取層級的列印。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性物件和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全性物件，包含所有狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that combines the permission object and the target permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限結合的權限和目標權限物件。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the operations represented by the current permission object, and all the operations represented by the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的結果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.Union%2A>是代表目前權限物件所代表的所有作業與指定權限物件所代表的所有作業的權限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.Union%2A>

trans-unit.source: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的權限物件相同類型的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 新的權限物件代表目前權限物件和指定的權限物件的聯集。

trans-unit.source: target is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: target是不是與目前權限物件相同類型的物件。
